metadata.description: Accurate API model IDs, pricing, and specs for 94 AI models across 19 providers. Prevents your coding agent from using outdated or hallucinated model names.

plugins.name: model-id-cheatsheet
plugins.description: Gives Claude instant access to accurate API model IDs, pricing, and specs for 94 models across 19 providers (OpenAI, Anthropic, Google, xAI, Meta, Mistral, DeepSeek, Amazon, Cohere, Perplexity, AI21, Moonshot, Zhipu, NVIDIA, Tencent, Microsoft, MiniMax, Xiaomi, Kuaishou). Auto-updated daily.
